creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: standing wooden figure with flame like hair, and fierce expression wearing warrior clothing; wide stance with PR hand clenched in fist toward chest; PL hand clenched in fist with index finger pointing outward
marks:
Inscription

In black ink on the peg of the left
medium: Wood with polychromy and inlaid rock crystal
title: One of the Twelve Divine Generals
